live_updates: Our technicians have been able to restore service to majority of the affected customers and are continuing to work to get the rest online as soon as possible. We appreciate your continued patience. Thank you

Technicians continue to work to restore services as soon as possible.

Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
Further issues in the area have been found.  Teams are back on site working towards a resolution.
Power has been restored and services should be restored.  We will continue to monitor.
We continue to await restoration of power in the affected areas. Once power is restored, our services will begin to come online.
